title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for expressing v P  ( 2.8 )− v P  ( 0.3 )=0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGOmaiaac6cacaaI4aaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaGaeyOeI0IaamODamaaBaaaleaacaWGqbaabeaakiaayIW7da qadaqaaiaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4maaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaa icdacaGGUaaaaa@452C@ Because these values come from the table, expressing 55−55 MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaaI1aGaaGynaiabgkHiTi aaiwdacaaI1aaaaa@371D@ earns the first point.

The second point is earned for declaring v P MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaaaa@3530@ to be continuous and connecting v P ′  ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOWaaWbaaSqabeaakiadaITHYaIOaaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGa amiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@3C64@ to the work for the first point.

Another approach involves an Extreme Value Theorem argument. The first point is earned for declaring v P  ( 0.3 )> v P  ( 1.7 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGimaiaac6cacaaIZaaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaGaeyOpa4JaamODamaaBaaaleaacaWGqbaabeaakiaayIW7da qadaqaaiaaigdacaGGUaGaaG4naaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@42D3@ and v P ( 1.7 )< v P ( 2.8 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOWaaeWaaeaacaaIXaGaaiOlaiaaiEdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaa cqGH8aapcaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadcfaaeqaaOWaaeWaaeaacaaIYa GaaiOlaiaaiIdaaiaawIcacaGLPaaacaGGUaaaaa@4066@ The second point is earned for declaring v P MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaaaa@3530@ to be continuous, and using continuity to conclude that v P  ( t ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaamiDaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaaaa@394D@ must have a minimum at some point c,   0.3<c<2.8, MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWGJbGaaiilaiaaykW7ca aMc8UaaGPaVlaaicdacaGGUaGaaG4maiabgYda8iaadogacqGH8aap caaIYaGaaiOlaiaaiIdacaGGSaaaaa@4166@ so v P ′  ( c )=0. MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG2bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOWaaWbaaSqabeaakiadaITHYaIOaaGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGa am4yaaGaayjkaiaawMcaaiabg2da9iaaicdacaGGUaaaaa@3EC5@

The student response accurately includes one of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes both of the criteria below.

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

Simplification is not required to earn this point. The point requires substitution of function values from the table.
descriptions: The student response does not accurately include any of the criteria below.
The student response accurately includes the criteria below.

title: Part C
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples and to score the response.

The first point is earned for an open or closed interval. The interval must be stated explicitly analytically or verbally; using the endpoints of the interval as the limits of integration in a definite integral is not sufficient to earn the first point.

The second point is earned for a definite integral of the form ∫ t 0 t 1 v Q  ( t )  dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadAhadaWgaa WcbaGaamyuaaqabaGccaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzk aaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGaamiDaaWcbaGaamiDamaaBaaameaaca aIWaaabeaaaSqaaiaadshadaWgaaadbaGaaGymaaqabaaaniabgUIi Ydaaaa@443B@ or ∫ t 0 t 1 |   v Q  ( t )  |  dt . MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaamaaemaabaGaaG jcVlaadAhadaWgaaWcbaGaamyuaaqabaGccaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG 0baacaGLOaGaayzkaaGaaGjcVdGaay5bSlaawIa7aiaaykW7caaMc8 UaamizaiaadshaaSqaaiaadshadaWgaaadbaGaaGimaaqabaaaleaa caWG0bWaaSbaaWqaaiaaigdaaeqaaaqdcqGHRiI8aOGaaiOlaaaa@4B3B@

The third point does not require units.

title: Part D
stimulusHtml:
Select a point value to view scoring criteria, solutions, and/or examples to score the response.

The first point is earned for the integral ∫ 0 2.8 v Q  ( t )  dt MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaadaWdXaqaaiaadAhadaWgaa WcbaGaamyuaaqabaGccaaMi8+aaeWaaeaacaWG0baacaGLOaGaayzk aaGaaGPaVlaaykW7caWGKbGaamiDaaWcbaGaaGimaaqaaiaaikdaca GGUaGaaGioaaqdcqGHRiI8aaaa@4359@ or ∫ 0 2.8 |   v Q  ( t )  |  dt . The third point is earned for the difference between x P  ( 2.8 ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aqatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadc faaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGOmaiaac6cacaaI4aaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaaaaa@3A86@ and x Q  ( 2.8 ). MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbdfgBPj MCPbqedmvETj2BSbqefm0B1jxALjhiov2DaebbnrfifHhDYfgasaac H8rrps0lbbf9q8WrFfeuY=Hhbbf9v8qqaqFr0xc9pk0xbba9q8WqFf ea0=yr0RYxir=Jbba9q8aq0=yq=He9q8qqQ8frFve9Fve9Ff0dmeaa baqaciGacaGaaeqabaWaaeaaeaaakeaacaWG4bWaaSbaaSqaaiaadg faaeqaaOGaaGjcVpaabmaabaGaaGOmaiaac6cacaaI4aaacaGLOaGa ayzkaaGaaiOlaaaa@3B38@ Any incorrect value from Part B of this question, handled correctly, makes the response eligible for the third point. The third point does not require units.
